Dialogue.Page: Whoa! Geez, that was quite the landing! Where’d you come from? No one’s come here in… well, ever, actually.
That makes you the second Hearthian to ever reach Dark Bramble — after me, of course. Well done!
…Say, it’s you! They made you an astronaut? And you haven’t blown yourself up yet, good for you!
Whoa! Harsh landing, huh?
Goodness, well, wanna hear some tales of my exploits?
Whoa!
Okay, first off, stay away from the fire pit. Second off, where’d you come from? No one’s come here in… well, ever, actually.
That makes you the second Hearthian to ever reach Dark Bramble — after me, of course. Well done!
…Say, it’s you! They made you an astronaut? And you haven’t blown yourself up yet, good for you!
Whoa! Hatchling, you're supposed to roast the marshmallows, not yourself!
Goodness, well, wanna hear some tales of my exploits?
Ah, hatchling, I see you too are a connoisseur of finely-aged marshmallows. It's nice to finally meet a fellow Hearthian of culture.
Come to hear tales of my heroic exploits, have you?

DialogueOption.Text: I landed on the Sun Station with my ship.
Just thought you'd like to know there's an invisible planet in our solar system.

Dialogue.Page: Oho! Hatchling, is that a piece of treasure you're carrying?
Heh. Well well, I must say, I'm a bit proud! Come on, pull up a marshmallow stick, fellow adventurer.
Heh. Alright, alright hatchling, don't get sappy on me! Riebeck gives better hugs than me anyways.
…Whoa. Say, hatchling, you weren't expecting anyone else coming here, were you? It sounds like someone crash landed!
…That doesn't sound good.
Clearly so! But I imagine you mean something other than what you've got in your hand, mmm?
Ahaha! Really now, hatchling! The Sun Station?
Wow! That's a risky play. Matter of fact, I'd say it's downright stupid!
Ahh… I'm so proud. The kids are alright if you ask me! Hahaha…
Whoa! Hang on now, hatchling, there's an inside to that thing?
Hearth, nobody's ever even landed on it! My my, you must feel quite proud of yourself, exploring uncharted territory!
You're a real trailblazer, hatchling. Just don't let it get to your head.
An invisible planet?! Hearth dang it, that's no fair! How could I have known?
Ah… no, I shouldn't get so mad. That's great news for you, hatchling! Have fun exploring it.
Ah! Well, that makes two of us, then.
Sigh… well, hatchling, you've got two choices here.
First off, you could come stay here with ol' Feldspar, living off the land, roasting marshmallows, and swapping tales of adventure!
Secondly, you could try floating your way out, which I wouldn't recommend on account of the myriad ravenous anglerfish.
You might think that the third option is to radio back home, but as you can probably imagine, that got kablooey'd along with everything else in my ship.
Now, don't start worrying about what's gonna happen to you! First off, you're not gonna die, not with me around. And secondly, I'm sure someone'll come rescue us. Eventually.
…Try not to worry about it, alright hatchling?
